title: Unfinished Flow
description: A partially completed 3D animated music video for a rap artist. Features full character modeling, partial animations, and multiple experimental test footages combining visual style exploration with editing.

title: Odin Pendant Animation
description: A case study showcasing the design and animation of a Norse mythology-inspired pendant. Modeled in ZBrush, animated in Blender, and rendered in Maverick Render with detailed material work.

title: MediaPipe + Ableton + PointCloud
description: A TouchDesigner case study using the built-in MediaPipe plugin to control a 3D point cloud via hand gestures. The point cloud was generated from a personal drone scan of an abandoned house in Şile.

title: Nike Air Jordan CGI
description: A CGI placement of Nike Air Jordan sneakers onto an iconic building in Istanbul. The project focuses on integrating high-quality 3D assets seamlessly into real-world urban architecture.

title: Bic Mini Lighter Spider Case
description: A case study of a custom silver case for Bic mini lighters, designed for the Sarnion brand. Features a spider web motif with gemstone eyes. Produced, sold, and integrated into the product line.

title: Space Keycap Animation
description: A 3D animation for a custom mechanical keyboard spacebar keycap. Modeled in ZBrush, animated in Blender, and rendered in Maverick Render with refined material detailing.

title: Oxidized Silver Jewelry — Maverick
description: A look development case study in Maverick Render, focused on achieving a realistic oxidized silver material through multiple iterations and shader refinements.

title: YouTube Channel Intro
description: A motion design case study for the Punkart YouTube channel, developed in collaboration with Barış Yardımcı. 3D models were created and animated in Blender, with a custom rain simulation added directly within the scene. Multiple concepts were explored before finalizing the visual direction.

title: AI Visualizer from Image
description: An AI-driven visualizer project for the Punkart YouTube channel's 'Buzz' track, created in collaboration with Barış Yardımcı. The workflow involved transforming a provided image into a dynamic, music-synced animation using AI generation, motion design, and custom editing.
